item.title: Installing Deepin Desktop on Manjaro
item.description: Deepin desktop version of the Manjaro community is no longer maintained, want to use deepin desktop also need to install their own, the installation process encountered more problems, recorded. Step 1: Install Manjaro I downloaded the Plasma Desktop version of Manjaro, which is the KDE version, and other versions should be similar. Update your system after the installation is complete. Step 2: Install xorg Xorg is an open source implementation
